item.title: Ubuntu 18.04 安装Clang/LLVM 11
item.description: 从 APT 安装 Install the GPG Key for https://apt.llvm.org/ wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add - Add the repo for Clang 11 stable-old for Ubuntu 18.04 Bionic echo "deb http://apt.llvm.org/bionic/ llvm-toolchain-bionic-11 main" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list sudo apt-get update Install practically everything (except python-clang-11 which for some reason doesn’t work) sudo apt-get install libllvm-11-ocaml-dev libllvm11 llvm-11 llvm-11-dev llvm-11-doc llvm-11-examples llvm-11-runtime \ clang-11 clang-tools-11 clang-11-doc libclang-common-11-dev libclang-11-dev
